website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced catcher's set that includes a chest protector, leg guards, and a helmet.
pros: A great entry-level catcher's set that is designed for quick change, so the catcher can slip in and out in a matter of seconds
The equipment is durable and holds up even under moderate misuse
cons: The velcro on the leg guards has a tendency to lose its gripping power over time, which can be frustrating to deal with during a game

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner's set, good price
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great for a beginner just learning how to catch. It's worth the money, because when your kid(s) are just starting you're not sure if they'll like it. It's cheap and won't break the bank if they don't like it. I purchased this for my daughter, she plays travel softball. The leg guards didn't make it through the entire season, the velcro stopped holding. With that being said, I think it's a good beginner's set because it works and it's cheap. Now it's time to purchase a really nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. The velcro straps have a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. The velcro straps have a lot of surface area. I'm sure that sounds irrelevant, but if you've coached kids ball before, you know the straps are dangled in the grass, and typically stop attaching well quickly. These seem to really hold up. I also like the shoulder pads these have, that most do not. Its also no longer necessary to have that terrible dangling throat guard the old kids had, now that the new hockey style helmet is available. I bought this for my average sized 7yr old and it fits him very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good starter package but Velcro leg straps BAD IDEA!!
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is fantastic. Chest piece is great ( 2 kids can switch this so fast and make quick adjustments). Leg pads ( my son loves the coverage on them) Velcro on the leg pads BAD!!! Keeps coming off. My son had to call time after almost every pitch to fix them. He had to switch back to older leg pads to finish the inning and game. Embarrassing!!! I am going to modify the straps to have a hook and clasp fastener. Get what u pay for. Helmet and Chest piece make this product a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I had to come back and revise this review. After a full season of using this gear, the team Loves it! Holds up extremely well, allows the kids effective mobility behind the plate, no complaints of discomfort. It's so easy to get on and take off that the kids do it themselves and the straps stay in place without fail. They actually bicker over who's playing the position. The more expensive gear, buckle design has no comparison on this.
customer_reviews.author: The new Wally’s

customer_reviews.title: Great set, perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6yrs old and plays Tball. He is on the smaller side, about 44” tall. This set fits him perfectly. The padding is great and allows him to move comfortably. The straps stay well secured and have plenty of length to grow with him. Maybe a bit too much. I have to tuck the excess straps in around his legs to insure they don’t get in the way of the Velcro straps. But otherwise the set is perfect. His mask is comfortable and well sized, again with enough room to grow with him for a couple of years. We got the smallest size.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilio Jaramillo II

customer_reviews.title: At 10 (soon to be 11 ) he weighs in around 120 lbs and this set fits him fine.
customer_reviews.text: My son is just starting out with baseball and asked for catchers gear. At 10 (soon to be 11 ) he weighs in around 120 lbs and this set fits him fine.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our son love it. It fits great. His helper coach loves the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha

customer_reviews.title: Broke first season we purchased
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first season we used it so only gave 3 stars because it broke so soon. My son was rough on it but no more than a catcher should be. Did not feel as if it should have broke as soon as it did & because we purchased on amazon, it was a third party sell and voided the year warranty (go figure) Would be great for c ball or practice only, not for competitive players above c ball
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I coach a 4u team and used this gear all season long. It worked perfectly and we never had any issues with it. Team mom was able to put it on and take it off every kid with ease. Highly recommend for tball teams 4u-6u
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa A Garza

customer_reviews.title: Velcro issues
customer_reviews.text: It look like a pretty good set but the Velcro just won't stay. Every time my boy squatted the knee protection would undo. We had to return it cause even when he ran they would come off. Maybe ok for tball but for hire division where there active the Velcro system just isn't that good.
customer_reviews.author: Abe.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Girl!
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 year old daughter began catching last summer. We borrowed equipment but decided it was time to invest in our own. For the price, this product was a no-brainer. The shin guards are Velcro with a large attachment sight that make the system easier to get on and take off. There are no knee protectors and I don't know how they would attach. We haven't looked into that accessory. The helmet is adjustable as is the chest protector. All in all we couldn't be happier with the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie J Cleary

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect and he loved it
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this for my 7 year old son. It was perfect and he loved it. My only complaint so far is that he's only had it for a month and used it quite a lot, but the velcro straps that hold the chin guards on are already getting worn and the velcro doesn't stay together on one of them anymore. He is very frustrated with that and super disappointed. That is why I give it only 2 stars. If the velcro was working I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom

customer_reviews.title: amazing gear for the money
customer_reviews.text: my son is 11, and over 100lbs, and this gear fits him amazing - I didn't want to spend a ton of money on gear since he's still in little league and his positions change. This gear comes on and off super quickly and **knock on wood** hasn't had any issues with the Velcro coming undone mid game (or practice)
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: It worked but....
customer_reviews.text: It worked to get my daughter through a softball season. Toward the end if the year the chest protector started coming apart at most of the seams, I figured this would happen because it was by far the cheapest part of the kit. The helmet and shin guards held up well. Sizing was bigger than expected but we made it work
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy velcro catchers gear!
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy velcro straps!!! It worked for one season and now the velcro no longer works. We either have to replace the velcro, buy hooks or just buy new catchers gear. Save yourself the time and money and buy catchers gear with hooks!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mota

customer_reviews.title: Fits correctly and we feel he's safer.
customer_reviews.text: My little grandson started playing as a back catcher this year. He's small and the regular ones were too big so we found and ordered this one. It is fantastic. Fits wonderful, is of good quality and my little one loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Earlene

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 9-year-old grandson. He is a little smaller than average, but the fit was still pretty good. He should get a couple of years wear with this. The knee pads are a little uncomfortable, but I think he'll grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Oaks

customer_reviews.title: It showed up and the leg "metal loops" look nothing like they appear in the picture
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I have read the reviews and agree that the straps should not be velcro, they should be metal hooks. I opted to purchase the red version which shows a picture with METAL loops so I assumed this color offered metal hooks instead of velcro straps. It showed up and the leg "metal loops" look nothing like they appear in the picture. Talk about deception! I'm sending this back immediately. I guess every now and then you need a reminder that you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of gear
customer_reviews.text: My boys really like it. From a long term view i wish it wasn’t velcro. I had to add a dangling throat protector to the mask to satisfy a little league board.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Hardware on the mask broke - looks like it's made of an aluminum can
customer_reviews.text: Hardware on the mask broke - looks like it's made of an aluminum can. As is typical with velcro shin guards, the velcro doesn't work too well. Chest protector is fine, but would use it for anything over 40 MPH. I was able to repair the mask with replacement hardware from Dick's but it was a pain and not a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sanny525

customer_reviews.title: The thing I liked is there are multiple places to tighten straps so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3-4 year old tball team. It is the smallest I could find. The shin guards are a little tall for my son, but I expected that. The thing I liked is there are multiple places to tighten straps so the small/medium size fits him. It should work great for the team. They should be able to use it through the years. I felt it was a fair price. It only took two days to arrive with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tball/Youth Baseball set
customer_reviews.text: This fits our 4 year and our soon-to-be 7 year old. We bought to use with our 6U baseball team. Very very well made, east to put on. Don't hesitate to order.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Good Helmet, Okay Gear for Price
customer_reviews.text: My son is 10 and the chest plate is a little small and seems thin. We had to buy a under shirt chest protector as well. I do think the helmet is quality which is what I cared about most.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Waters

customer_reviews.title: and didn't seem like it would provide a lot of protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8-year-old daughter, and we returned it after she tried it on. Very small, and didn't seem like it would provide a lot of protection.
customer_reviews.author: R. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Velcro on shin guards - poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Got this Wilson catcher's kit for my 8u team because it's priced right and a good novice set. I think it's adequate for beginners and coach pitch. Disappointing that the Velcro on the shin guards is already coming undone after only 7 games. Hopefully, we'll get 2 seasons out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Shin guards have become worn quickly
customer_reviews.text: The equipment arrived in good condition, but unfortunately it hasn't lasted through just one season of little league. The shin guards have become very scratched, and the padding on the chest protector is not that thick.. It is comfortable for my son, and the helmet has held up well, but the shin guards don't seem to be of very sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great gear for child catcher.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a child's set. Finally found this. Didn't want to pay alot because kids grow so fast. My 5 year old grandson loves this. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The velcro is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: These have velcro straps. Did not say they were velcro. The velcro is horrible and does not stay on good at all. It did fit right and the helmet is awesome. Those are the only good things about this catcher's gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kit for aspiring catchers!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product!!! Helmet and leg guards are comfortable and quality. Chest protector is suitable for age group. Packaging is reusable for a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Jones III

customer_reviews.title: Good basic starter set
customer_reviews.text: Good starter set. He's used them for a few games and they for great. My only concern, and the reason for not giving 5 stars is the use of Velcro in place of hook and D-ring or O-ring closures. I'm anticipating the Velcro will wear out fairly quickly and we'll be repairing or changing closures.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley LaLonde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Little League...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my six-year-old. We have not used the leg guards, but the mask and chest protector are great. He can put them on by himself and they fit great with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Stinkerbelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny catchers
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny 6 year old playing coach pitch. this was the only gear that fit her perfect and it was easy for her to get on and off herself bc of Velcro straps. Just make sure you shake out sand and dirt from straps so it doesn’t build up. Overall great first catchers gear equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this baseball kit to my nephew. The price is very accurate, excellent brand. I recommend this seller 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jhosue C.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this again I thought it was nice and easy to use at first
customer_reviews.text: The clips that hold the mask have started breaking within one month so after 5 games I have to try and replace. I have been able to remove some of the screws to replace but some won't come out. I wouldn't buy this again I thought it was nice and easy to use at first.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeptj98

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: All the kids who have used this on the team feel it is easier to put on then their old equipment. Obviously provides safety. Looks cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro straps on the catcher's chest protector had to be replaced. It would not stay on a moving child.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Graywolf Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great gear!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the large for our 8 yr old and while it’s a little big, it’s adjustable and he will be able to use it for a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Kelly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR YOUTH 4U-8U
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my five year old. The Velcro straps on the shin guards is convenient during the games. The Velcro stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: With just 3 months my son using the gear. The velcro is falling apart from the bottom part of its leg guards.
customer_reviews.author: The Uribe's

customer_reviews.title: Great youth product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits my 7 yr old perfect and is super easy for him to put on and take off himself. The helmet requires some adult help for adjustments. This products is great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SPD Mommy

customer_reviews.title: good set
customer_reviews.text: overall a good product biggest dislike is the velcro straps hard not to fill with dirt then they become useless and wont hold would prefer hook and loop over the velcro
customer_reviews.author: Christopher King

customer_reviews.title: The only thing my son didn’t like is the helmet looks more like a goalies mask ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing my son didn’t like is the helmet looks more like a goalies mask for hockey than a catchers mask
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: The gears are really nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: This catcher set fits my 10 year old son really well. He didn't have any problems. The gears are really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren wanted to try catching in their baseball league and this was great Fits 8-12 year olds unless really tall and has throat protector
customer_reviews.author: pat z

customer_reviews.title: misleading description
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the critical reviews first: photos show metal loops, description does not mention velcro for all straps; it will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Fam.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his catcher's equipment. He was awarded the game today for his 2 for 2 at bats and superior performance behind the plate. Did it meet my expectations? Yes, and his, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Good Practice Gear.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He gives it a thumbs up. I just wish it had a little more padding on the chest.
customer_reviews.author: R-knows

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: Large/X-large was too small for a 12 year old boy
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas present for my 6 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 6 year old grandson. He loves it and didn't want to take it off. It fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Catch from the lefty
customer_reviews.text: Great gear and I have a lot of growing room
customer_reviews.author: D Hunt

customer_reviews.title: ... very uncomfortable and the shin guards are not the best. He says the helmet is pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son and he says it's very uncomfortable and the shin guards are not the best. He says the helmet is pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Seedler

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment.  Hate velcro straps.
customer_reviews.text: Good equipment. I hate the velcro straps though, but, all the lower price equipment had that.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Gall

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great product.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves it! It’s super easy for him to put on and take off without any assistance. I like that it’s still adjustable so he has room to grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Imlay

customer_reviews.title: baseball
customer_reviews.text: fits a little big but is perfect for my little catcher
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Effner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 11 yr old daughter great. She's 5'0 about 80 LBs.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: These are Velcro leg guard straps. They are not ...
customer_reviews.text: These are Velcro leg guard straps. They are not strong and will need to be re-strapped alot. Spend a little more and get metal quick release straps.
customer_reviews.author: BCA

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't beat this.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat this. I got the Youth L, and it fits my 11 year old perfectly (he is about 105 pounds). Not for older middle school or high school kids...will be too small.
customer_reviews.author: David Longbine

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good padding. Protects from foul balls nicely but the velcro straps SUCK! They constantly come undone! Poor poor design.
customer_reviews.author: bobby hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Didnt even get through one Fall season without the helmets face mask hooks breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Cutrona's

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son received this for Christmas and absolutely loves it! Fits very well and has adjustable straps so you can adjust as they grow!
customer_reviews.author: HollyB007

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. The leg protectors are velcro fasteners and can be a little irritating when they keep coming undone other than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for baseball enthusiasts!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my grandson and he loved it! Seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JoyG

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this set for our 7-8 y/o PeeWee baseball ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for our 7-8 y/o PeeWee baseball team. The straps on the helmet broke during the 2nd inning on the first day it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to maneuver to stop balls
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her set. Comfortable and easy to maneuver to stop balls. Gives her the protection that she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha 808

customer_reviews.title: MISSING the chin guards and hest protector.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing in the box was the helmet. No chin guards nor chest protector? Got this as a Christmas gift and didn't open it until time to wrap it. Then, I discovered the problem past the return time line. Now, I have to buy a separate chin guard and chest protector.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie D Inman

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...but definitely not the worst catching gear
customer_reviews.text: Straps could be better especially on shin guards they don't stay strapped.
customer_reviews.author: Erica G. Coronado

customer_reviews.title: Velcro stinks!
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro lasted maybe three games and then they wouldn’t stay attached! I now have to go buy a new set of shin guards for my son to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. All pieces are secured by velcro so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. All pieces are secured by velcro so that is something to keep in mind. Perfect for tee ball and beginner little league.
customer_reviews.author: Shoeless Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 9 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Nice gear, son loves it and it's easy to put on with the Velcro. Had another parent comment saying he liked the Velcro versus his sons metal tabs.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Catcher gear
customer_reviews.text: The foot shield digs into my feet, the chest guard is comfortable and I feel very protected
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this! my son is only 8 years old but the Velcro design makes it soo easy for him to put on equipment and take off by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 yr old son loves his catchers gear - his whole team uses it. The gear is holding up really well. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great gear for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far, my daughter likes to catch in 8u coach pitch softball. I didnt want to spend a ton in case she doesnt want to to pursue it in fast pitch. This gear is holding up well, and seems to be made of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Douthit

customer_reviews.title: ... this year for our 8 year old son fits perfect I've actually thrown the ball to him when he's ...
customer_reviews.text: But this year for our 8 year old son fits perfect I've actually thrown the ball to him when he's missing the hit him in the chest piece he felt no pain need password find Best Equipment I've had
customer_reviews.author: Luis A Perez

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Product is not well made. Knee pads are velcro and do not stay on my boys legs. Chest pad will not offer any protection to my boy. Helmet is ok.
customer_reviews.author: adan

customer_reviews.title: Velcro on shin guards not clips
customer_reviews.text: Picture has clips on shin guards but they are Velcro. Velcro goes our very quick and not worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son wore it about 12times and it already ripped. Velcro ripped on the leg guards. Does not last.
customer_reviews.author: brenda diaz

customer_reviews.title: The velcro straps didn't stay put when the boy got ...
customer_reviews.text: The velcro straps didn't stay put when the boy got into position. Had to return for gear with the clip straps.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Emerman

customer_reviews.title: No chest protector
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with catchers chest protector. I’m sure this was a mistake, but I’m unable to rate product fairly.
customer_reviews.author: Katina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my nine year old, easy on and off, used for one season with no problems yet
customer_reviews.author: jennifer smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The chest and shiny guards fit perfectly but the helmet I could not adjust it to fit my Granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Valia

customer_reviews.title: Equipment is solid and fits my 10 & 12 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Equipment is solid and fits my 10 & 12 year olds very well. My only complaint is the Velcro. The Velcro on the strap has worn extremely fast and will not stayed attached when they are strapped. Had to rig my own Velcro system for them to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bell

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year olds fit in the equipment nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my T-Ball team! My 5 year olds fit in the equipment nicely!
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomas-France

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wish it had a bag to keep all the equipment together. Easy to get off and on. Great
customer_reviews.author: STEVE W.

customer_reviews.title: Great catcher's gear
customer_reviews.text: My 6 y/o grandson earned the money to "buy" this set. He was thrilled with it. He has loved baseball since he was old enough to throw a ball. The gear was just the right size for him, as he is a bit small for his age. I heard from his mom that he wanted to sleep in it the first night.
customer_reviews.author: treasa

customer_reviews.title: Love that the straps are Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on 5-7 year olds. Love that the straps are Velcro. Easy to put on & take off. Dugout Mom approved.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: great catchers gear for kids
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our league to provide for each of our coaches pitch and minor league teams. They are quick and easy to put on during the games with the Velcro shin guards instead of the clips. We used the small/medium size for the Coaches Pitch (ages 6-8) and the Large/XL size for our Minor league players (ages 9-10). Will continue to purchase these for the league.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Ordered right size according to website. Way too small for 10 year old. And hated the Velcro leg guard straps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of CRAP! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Brutally cheap! DO NOT BUY! My 8u softball team has played 6... Yes only 6 (six) games with this gear and it sucks ROYALLY! Not worth 2cents.. The shin guard Velcro started having issues after game 2... After game 6 I might as well throw them in the trash or spend $ to completely re- engineer them (btw- I am not an engineer so that is not an option). STAY AWAY from these and spend a few extra $'s and buy a set that will last longer than 2 games that does NOT have any Velcro straps...ordering a set of Mizuno's today...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Warlick Bogle

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it 😀
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I expected, meet all my expectations. The kids loved it 😀
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. For the price all around great starter set
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it. It's great set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie vega

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great equipment for the price. What a great value. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awsome but wiry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price fits my 10 year old perfectly a little worried about the straps lasting over time.

customer_reviews.title: Photo description not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Had to reorder this item. The leg guards are not as pictured and did not cover my daughters legs properly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great on my 7 year old nephew. He loves it.

customer_reviews.text: Masks are difficult to adjust to different size players but the Velcro Shin Guards are great for quick on and off.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my husband! Coaches baseball!! He loves the equipment! Great brand to get!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality the helmet is a little big for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality the helmet is a little big for my son so it's not as snug to his face like it's supposed to, has Velcro straps on chin guards so hoping they last as long as he needs it to
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: No hook and loops to hold leg pads. Just velcro
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW NAUGHTIN

customer_reviews.title: velcro closures--not hooks
customer_reviews.text: one big thing to note is that this catcher's gear uses velcro closure rather than the metal hooks I am accustom to. My kids have not used it yet, but I bet they will wear out the Velcro in one season
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Kelly
